hooks.command:
bash -c 'mkdir -p .fsctx/{scratch/{tool_outputs,subagents},memory/{plans,history,patterns},index} 2>/dev/null; find .fsctx/scratch/tool_outputs -type f -mmin +60 -delete 2>/dev/null; find .fsctx/scratch/subagents -type f -mmin +120 -delete 2>/dev/null; if [ -d .git ] && ! grep -q ".fsctx/scratch" .gitignore 2>/dev/null; then echo -e "
# FewWord context plugin
.fsctx/scratch/
.fsctx/index/" >> .gitignore 2>/dev/null && echo "[fewword] Added to .gitignore"; fi; echo "[fewword] Ready"'

bash -c 'if [ -f .fsctx/index/current_plan.yaml ] && grep -q "status: completed" .fsctx/index/current_plan.yaml 2>/dev/null; then ts=$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S); mv .fsctx/index/current_plan.yaml ".fsctx/memory/plans/archived_${ts}.yaml" 2>/dev/null && echo "[fewword] Archived completed plan"; fi'
bash -c 'size=$(du -sm .fsctx/scratch 2>/dev/null | cut -f1); if [ "${size:-0}" -gt 100 ]; then echo "[fewword] Warning: .fsctx/scratch/ is ${size}MB - consider cleanup"; fi'
